sentences.en: Their sole aim is to destabilize the Indian government.
sentences.cn: 他们的惟一目的是要动摇印度政府的统治。

sentences.en: Terrorist attacks were threatening to destabilize the government.
sentences.cn: 恐怖袭击威胁着政府的稳定。

sentences.en: Obviously, changes destabilize us out of our comfort zone.
sentences.cn: 很显然，改变会使我们离开内心舒适区。
